name: Spaceship Invaders
description:
SpaceshipInvaders is a innovative gust of wind in stalled gaming industry. We have created something new, with unprecedented mechanics and controls that were incorporated in well known and beloved retro gaming experience.

How to play
- On the right side you are able to see list of available features that your spaceship accommodates. Type corresponding code on your keyboard to activate them (typing backwards will disable them instead).
- Shoot
- Don't die
- Have fun (We are specifically requesting it)
